title: Sheriff: Solider charged with violating stay-at-home order
description: NEWNAN, Ga. (AP) — A Georgia soldier was arrested and accused of violating stay-at-home orders, fleeing from state troopers and driving drunk while attempting to visit his family in Alabama, authorities said.
content:
NEWNAN, Ga. (AP) A Georgia soldier was arrested and accused of violating stay-at-home orders, fleeing from state troopers and driving drunk while attempting to visit his family in Alabama, authorities said.
